title: Underwriter Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Aviva (London, England) in Apr 2023
Interview Descriptions: Spoke to recruiter, about 2 weeks later was booked for an interview with team. Mostly talk about experience, motivations and I was provided with lots of detail on what the job involved and how the team was structured.
Interview Questions: How would your academic background help

title: Underwriter Interview
Interview Descriptions: Zoom first stage interview with basic strength based questions. Easy to answer and a very comfortable environment. Lasted around 30-40 minutes with the opportunity to ask questions at the end.
Interview Questions: Your basic daily routine and what an ideal day would look like

title: Graduate Scheme Interview
Interview Descriptions: The interview was conducted online with pop up questions. Given some time to think about your answer and then five minutes to speak. A range of different questions were asked.
Interview Questions: Where do you see yourself in five years

title: Investment Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 months. I interviewed at Aviva (Milan) in Nov 2020
Interview Descriptions: Il colloquio si è basato su una conoscenza generica del CV e dell'esperienza lavorativa. Dopodichè sono seguite alcune domande tecniche sulla posizione, in particolar modo sul mercato Fixed Income che era il focus della posizione. Infine sono state effettuate alcune domande sulle soft skills.
Interview Questions: Can you give an example of something you consider innovative?

title: Therapist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Aviva (Los Angeles, CA) in May 2019
Interview Descriptions: First was a call to schedule the interview from the HR personel,It is a Two-stage process, First Interview with the HR, second with the clinical director and another high ranking member of the agency.
Interview Questions: Why do you want to be a therapist

title: Case Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied through a staffing agency. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Aviva in Sept 2016
Interview Descriptions: Submit resume online. There are two rounds of interviews. HR Manager contacts and schedules you for interview. Interview with HR Manager is the first round. Interview with potential Supervisor. notification of second interview is via email
Interview Questions: How do you practice self care?

title: Outreach Case Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Aviva (Los Angeles, CA) in Jun 2012
Interview Descriptions: Went for 2 interviews, the first one was very good. Second one was not that great. When it came to the second interview the person who interviewed me was very rushed and did not really acknowledge me. I felt that by the time I went for the second interview, the person had already picked another candidate, as she had no interest in what I had to say. I ended up not getting the job and then was called about a month later and offered another position, which i declined.
